synopsis.text:
They are an elite group known as Hunters, skilled in a myriad of fields, from the pursuit of rare treasures to the capture of dangerous criminals. To join their ranks, one must pass a formidable and deadly exam, a challenge few can conquer. Yet, for Gon Freecss, a young boy hailing from a small village, this perilous path is the only way to reunite with his father, a legendary Hunter himself.

Embarking on this journey, Gon encounters a diverse group of aspiring Hunters, each with their own motivations and dreams. Among them are Kurapika, a vengeful youth seeking retribution for his clan's annihilation, Leorio, a determined medical student yearning to afford his education, and Killua, a rebellious prodigy from a notorious family of assassins. Together, they strive to overcome the trials and tribulations of the Hunter Exam, forging friendships and alliances in the face of adversity.

As they delve deeper into the world of Hunters, Gon and his newfound friends must confront their own limits and the deadly threats lurking in the shadows. With danger at every turn and the odds stacked against them, will they emerge victorious and claim the coveted title of Hunter? Only time will tell in this thrilling and captivating adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
